title: Decay question
body:
Hi there,

Currently I'm in D5, I just haven't won a game in awhile in soloq, but have been losing, and lost a game like 5 hours ago, does this count as playing a match to prevent decay? Or do I have to win a game to prevent decay? Thanks in advance!

replies.body: You're fine!  Ranked decay doesn't care if you win or lose, as long as you play a game!  Hope that offers some ease.  :D
